com.quinsoft.zeidon.standardoe

Interface JavaOeConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJavaOeConfiguration

    public interface JavaOeConfiguration
    Defines the configuration options for instantiating a JavaObjectEngine.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExecutorService getActivateThreadPool()
      Returns the thread pool used for asynchronous activates.
      DomainClassLoader getDomainClassLoader() 
      HomeDirectory getHomeDirectory()
      The Zeidon home directory is used override the classpath for determining the location of application files.
      String getJmxAppName()
      Specifies the app name for JMX object names that are created.
      ObjectEngineEventListener getObjectEngineListener() 
      ConcurrentMap<String,Task> getPersistentTaskCacheMap()
      This is the map that stores persistent Zeidon tasks.
      ZeidonPreferencesFactory getPreferencesFactory()
      Returns the factory that the OE uses for loading application preferences.
      UuidGenerator getUuidGenerator()
      Returns UUID generator.
      ZeidonLogger getZeidonLogger()
      Returns the logger used while bootstrapping the Object Engine.

    • Method Detail

      • getHomeDirectory

        HomeDirectory getHomeDirectory()
        The Zeidon home directory is used override the classpath for determining the location of application files. Use this with caution.
        Returns:
        object for determining the Zeidon home directory.

        DomainClassLoader getDomainClassLoader()

        Returns:
        the logger used while bootstrapping the Object Engine.

      • getPreferencesFactory

        ZeidonPreferencesFactory getPreferencesFactory()
        Returns the factory that the OE uses for loading application preferences.
        Returns:

      • getActivateThreadPool

        ExecutorService getActivateThreadPool()
        Returns the thread pool used for asynchronous activates.
        Returns:

      • getUuidGenerator

        UuidGenerator getUuidGenerator()
        Returns UUID generator. UUIDs are generated for many internal Zeidon objects so this should be fast.
        Returns:

      • getPersistentTaskCacheMap

        ConcurrentMap<String,Task> getPersistentTaskCacheMap()
        This is the map that stores persistent Zeidon tasks. It's only job is to prevent persistent tasks from being cleaned up. It may allow tasks to expire if configured to do so.
        Returns:

      • getJmxAppName

        String getJmxAppName()
        Specifies the app name for JMX object names that are created. This is intended to be used in environments that might have multiple ObjectEngines loaded, like Tomcat. Then each OE will have JMX objects created with a different name. A sample might be the context name in Tomcat (e.g. resteay-1.10.100).
        Returns:
